channel.title: Making Items In Server Update To Look Like Updated Ones In Runescape?
channel.description: Is there something I can download or w/e to make the items in my server look the same as in runescape, i.e. The d chain has changed how it looks in inv, plus when you wear it, same for all barrows and chainbodys, and fire cape? Any help greatly appreciated ;D ;D

item.title: Making Items In Server Update To Look Like Updated Ones In Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

[quote=“popbob, post:2, topic:55149”]That would involve making clients that are connecting to the server to download the latest item cache files, and then have them write to the correct area on the drive, etc. Look up on some java communities and you might find some good examples.[/quote]Or you could go to RS2 Server downloads and download Endar, that has the new cache in it…

Read full topic
item.source: Making Items In Server Update To Look Like Updated Ones In Runescape?

item.title: Making Items In Server Update To Look Like Updated Ones In Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @popbob popbob
item.description:
@popbob wrote:

That would involve making clients that are connecting to the server to download the latest item cache files, and then have them write to the correct area on the drive, etc. Look up on some java communities and you might find some good examples.

Read full topic
